      • wakaMove

        public java.lang.String wakaMove(java.lang.String inputKey,
                                 java.lang.String temp_input,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)
        The method processes the raw direction input from the user, then return the correct, adjusted input
        Parameters:
        inputKey: - waka's direction at the moment.
        temp_input: - user's raw input.
        cellMap: - list of list of Cells.
        Returns:
        final input.

      • move

        public boolean move(java.lang.String inputKey,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)
        Through careful mathematical calculation, this method uses 4 points in the direction of input to determine if the space ahead of waka is walkable, and whether waka should follow the input direction.
        Returns:
        true: Waka can move in the direction of input./false: Waka Can't move in the direction of input.

      • setImgs

                    processing.core.PImage playerLeftImg)
        set Waka's PImage in different orientations.

      • reverseStatus

        public void reverseStatus()
        reverse Waka's mouth opening status(close to open, open to close)

      • getEnableFrightenedMode

        public boolean getEnableFrightenedMode()
        Gatter method for frightened mode
        Returns:
        enableFrightenedMode, true if the frightened mode is enabled.

      • setEnableFrightenedMode

        Setter method for frightened mode.

      • timeFrightened

        public int timeFrightened(int length,
                          int frightenedModePointer)
        this method controls the length of frightened mode from Waka's perspective, Ghosts use this method, like listener, listening for the event happen in Waka's world, e.g. eating a superfruit.
        Parameters:
        length: - configured length of frightened mode.
        frightenedModePointer: - frightened mode pointer in Ghost
        Returns:
        waka-updated frightened mode pointer.
